songName: A Lwan Pyay A Nann (အလွမ်းပြေအနမ်း)
about: "A Lwan Pyay A Nann," meaning "Kisses for Longing," is a pop song about the emotional struggles of a person in a long-distance relationship, expressing their love and desire to be reunited with their partner
whenToListen: When you're missing someone you love and are apart from them, feeling the distance but holding onto hope for a reunion.
romanized:
Ta ywae ywae pyaung loh thwar khae nay yat dway
a lwan myar ka toe loh nate set nay
tann ta khae min yae a ngwae thet lay
a nar nar a myal shi say chin
nga yae nya nae ma net dway htal

Bal tot hma doh hna yout nee hmar lal
bal a chain hti ngar saunt ya ma lae
tagal ko tann ta mi tal
min yae a nann dway lae
ngar doh a hmat ta ya myar swar lae
min may ma pyit lite par nae
bal lo nay yar dway way loh thwar pa say
nga yin htal hmar min ta yout htal

Kyal pwint lay myar lan pya own...
kaung ma lay nae nee nai pho...
a nay way loh thway aye thwar hmar ngar kyout loh...
min sait htal a myal tann shi par say
sone nai hmar par doh na yout ta nay...
a khu tot phone lay htel bae
a lwan pyay a nann dway pay

Nga ko a myal lo thee khan nar lal pay thu
pyat tha nar tine har thu yae a hmar loh thway thu
a way hmar yout nay lae sait thar cha bay lu
zakar tway nar ma yaung nae
ngar doh bae tot hma ma way buu

swal taw pin ka a ywat lay lo
na lwar poun hma ta ywat htal so
ta nay tot poun mal
ngar doh na yout yae na lone thar na khu htal
ta khu tal a phyit tho yout nai pho
ngar doh a hmat ta ya myar swar lal
min may ma pyit lite par nae
bal lo nay yar dway way loh thwar pa say
nga yin htal hmar min ta yout htal

Kya pwin lay mya lan pya ooo...
Kaung ma lay nae nay nae poh...
A nay way lo thway aye thwa ma ngar kout lo
Min sait htel a myay tan shi par say
Sone nay mal par tote nway nway tae one nay...
A ku to phone lay htel par
A lwan pya a nan dway pay

Ho oh oh... ho...
Ho... oh...
Hoo hoo...
Hoo oh... hoo... oh...
Hey!
meaning:
Days passed by so quickly,
The loneliness grows and torments me.
I long for the scent of you.
Wishing you were always by my side
in my nights and mornings.

When will we ever be close?
How long must I wait?
I truly miss you
and your kisses too.
Please don't forget our memories.
No matter how far we get apart,
you're the only one in my heart.

Stars, please show me the way...
so I can be close to my girl...
I'm afraid the distance will make our love fade...
Please always have me in your heart.
One day, we'll meet again...
For now, only on the phone,
I give you kisses to ease the loneliness.

You're always the one who understands me.
The one who believes every problem is her fault.
Though you're far away, I trust you completely.
Don't let the words get to you.
We will never be apart.

Like the leaves on an orchid tree,
if two layers make one leaf,
we'll be united one day,
and for our hearts to become one,
please don't forget our memories.
No matter how far we get apart,
you're the only one in my heart.

Stars, please show me the way...
so I can be close to my girl...
I'm afraid the distance will make our love fade...
Please always have me in your heart.
One day, we'll meet again...
For now, only on the phone,
I give you kisses to ease the loneliness.
